aws_credentials_profile_name.description: (required) references credentail groups in ~/.aws/credentials; used by our Makefiles, boto and aws cli.

environment.description: (required) used throughout to segregate remote storage and pick setting from map variables

tf_remote_state_s3_storage_bucket.description: terraform remote s3 backend bucket name, these should match the config in .terragrunt

tf_remote_state_s3_storage_region.description: terraform remote s3 storage region, these should match the config in .terragrunt
